snippet: Seeing Tracie Bennett in “End of the Rainbow” isn’t the only way to encounter the spirit and legacy of Judy Garland in the New York region.
abstract: Songs of Judy Garland and Liza Minnelli can be seen performed at Minnelli's April 21 concert in Long Island or by impersonators in several long-running cabaret shows.
lead_paragraph: Seeing Tracie Bennett in “End of the Rainbow” isn’t the only way to encounter the spirit and legacy of Judy Garland in the New York region.
